ValidationRule.description: A Sales agent must submit an approval request to pass the security check to proceed with Credit passing the application.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( TEXT(Application_Status__c) <> "Draft", Passed_Security_Check__c = FALSE, CONTAINS($User.Role_Name__c, "Telesales"), NOT(CONTAINS($User.Role_Name__c, "Team_Leader")) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: WES Telesales must submit an approval request for a Security Check before application can be sent to Credit.
